metadata.name: BROKEN HOPES
metadata.description:
BROKEN HOPE - FREE MINT ( only 500 editions) 

This is the last photo from my broken lens (Tamron 15-30). So this one belongs to the community 
And people who stood for me in the moment of need. 

WHY FREE ? Let me tell you a story of “BROKEN HOPE” 

On sep 26 on Iceland tour I broke my main 
Wide angle lens and main one, I was sad and devastated

So, I looked for the help in ICELAND and I tweeted about this incident and within a seconds people came into DMs and RT/QT and whole community stood for me to help me in that remote land.So this broken hope got the new hope from the community and people who not just helped me but encouraged me to move on and live the rest of the trip and don’t affect your mental health or photography due to this..
